ModMetaData.name: CK - Animals
ModMetaData.author: Coercion (Textures) | KapTaiN_KaVerN (Code)
ModMetaData.description: A fork of CK Animals and Plants. This version is updated to A16 and guts the entire mod leaving only the animals intact for a broader range of compatability (or people who just wanted their excellent work on the additional animals).
